class Lucky():
    hashed={0:0, 1:8, 2:16 ,3:24 ,4:4, 5:12 ,6:20}
    test_cases=int(raw_input())
    arr=[]
    for j in range(test_cases):
        inp=int(raw_input())
        arr.append(inp)    
    for k in arr:
        n=(k%7)
        if(k<hashed[n]):
            print -1
        else:    
            print k-hashed[n]
